attributes.additional_details: the EU is no longer is britain interests to be a part of, new more promising markets are needed to push the UK out of this economic crisis. We want the UK to form a new trading bloc consisting of Norway, Austrailia, New zealand, Canada and perhaps Denmark and Germany, these are strong economies with good prospects, high purchasing power and high HDI exactly the sort of markets that if were made open to UK businesses may prosper from.
